div.head: 玉莖長硬不痿
div.div: long-term hardness of the jade stalk and its failure to return to dysfunction

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

form.pron: Yu jing chang ying bu wei
form.usg: its failure to return to dysfunction

entry.def: long-term hardness of the jade stalk and its failure to return to dysfunction

sense.def: Illness Sign identical with yu jing bu wei 玉莖不痿 , failure of the jade stalk to return to dysfunction. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Bai bing zhu zhi yao 百病主治藥：玉莖長硬不痿，精出 捏之則脆癢如刺針，名腎漏 , “ The jade stalk is hard and fails to return to dysfunction for a long time . When one pinches it while seminal fluid is discharged then it feels crisp and [the patient] experiences an itch as if pierced with a needle. This is called ‘kidney leakage’”.
